amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving prevention and treatment measures to mitigate agricultural impacts from virus outbreaks, such as impacts seen from the avian influenza poultry outbreak.

vote.text: Amendment SA 882 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 882 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Carper. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2019) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving prevention and treatment measures to mitigate agricultural impacts from virus outbreaks, such as impacts seen from the avian influenza poultry outbreak.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 882 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 882 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Carper.
